channel.title: When your bored or want a laugh
channel.description:
Whenever Iâ€™m bored, have free time or just want to escape from the stress of life I used to mull around and keep relying on my imagination to cook something up. But I now Iâ€™ve abandoned my imagination like every other teenager and turned to the Almighty Computer for solutions.
Whenever Iâ€™m bored I just log onto http://uncyclopedia.org/wiki/Main_Page (Thnx to PaulT) Itâ€™s a always a real larf and you practically never get bored of it. Itâ€™s like a Harvard Library of Jokes.
So next time when your bored just log on, grab some soda, a cloth to wipe your screen when you spew out Mountain Dew and HAVE THE TIME OF YOUR LIFE :rolleyes:
~ VG_Kobra ~
